mapper.select: SELECT a.quesID, a.quesDesc, a.rightAnswerID, b.ansID, b.ansDesc, a.quesType FROM (select * from t_question where quesID > #{questionID} and typeID = #{typeID} limit 0,1 ) a JOIN t_answer b ON a.quesID = b.quesID
SELECT count(1) FROM t_question where typeID = #{typeID}
SELECT a.quesID, a.quesDesc, a.rightAnswerID, a.typeID, b.ansID, b.ansDesc, a.quesType FROM t_question a JOIN t_answer b ON a.quesID = b.quesID and a.quesID = #{questionID}
